description: Creates an assessment report for the specified assessment.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the new assessment report.

parameters.name: queryStatement
parameters.description: A SQL statement that represents an evidence finder query. Provide this parameter when you want to generate an assessment report from the results of an evidence finder search query. When you use this parameter, Audit Manager generates a one-time report using only the evidence from the query output. This report does not include any assessment evidence that was manually added to a report using the console, or associated with a report using the API. To use this parameter, the enablementStatus of evidence finder must be ENABLED. For examples and help resolving queryStatement validation exceptions, see Troubleshooting evidence finder issues in the Audit Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: assessmentReport
nested_items.description: The new assessment report that the CreateAssessmentReport API returned.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the assessment report.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name that's given to the assessment report.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the specified assessment report.

nested_items.name: awsAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the specified Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: assessmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the specified assessment.

nested_items.name: assessmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the associated assessment.

nested_items.name: author
nested_items.description: The name of the user who created the assessment report.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the specified assessment report.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the assessment report was created.
